summary: The study focuses on integrating carbene-transfer chemistry into biosynthesis using various P450 enzymes and plasmids. Enzymes such as TbtJ1, CYP119, and P450 BM3 were screened for their catalytic activity.
key_claims: Screened P450s including TbtJ1, CYP119, and P450 BM3
Used plasmids like pAZA007 and pAZA132 for expressing genes in S. albus
